Title: Volcanoth!
Description:
It took a lot of blood, sweat, and tears, but the Bootzooka, patent-pending, is ready for use!

These no-good pygmies have been feeding our people to their "god", Volcanoth, and they're about to unleash it on our town!

You have to get into the cave and kill that thing before it's too late!
ObjectivesText: Use the Bootzooka to slay Volcanoth.
PortraitGiverText: Use the Bootzooka to bring down this monstrosity!!!
RewardText:
I managed to get everyone else safely back to town.

Jump in, we gotta get out of here before the volcano blows for good!!!
